typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		organizationid as string,
		ntt_identifier as string,
		ntt_name as string,
		statecode as string,
		statuscode as string,
		createdby as string,
		ntt_debteligibilityreviewtypeid as string,
		modifiedon as string,
		modifiedby as string,
		createdon as string,
		ntt_narrative as string,
		intBatchId as integer,
		partdist as date,
		blIsValid as boolean,
		tsCreatedOn as timestamp,
		tsModifiedOn as timestamp,
		strNTTDebtEligibilityReviewTypeId as string,
		strNTTName as string,
		blIsTruncate as boolean,
		strNTTDebtId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sourceValidation
sourceValidation select(mapColumn(
		organizationid,
		ntt_identifier,
		ntt_name,
		statecode,
		statuscode,
		createdby,
		ntt_debteligibilityreviewtypeid,
		modifiedon,
		modifiedby,
		createdon,
		ntt_narrative,
		intBatchId,
		partdist,
		blIsValid,
		tsCreatedOn,
		tsModifiedOn,
		strNTTDebtEligibilityReviewTypeId,
		strNTTName,
		blIsTruncate,
		strNTTDebtId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowSink
AlterRowSink sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'curation',
	folderPath: 'ods/bss/dynamics/moratoriums/debteligibilityreviewtype',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['strNTTDebtEligibilityReviewTypeId'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		partdist
	)) ~> sinkODS
